Articles.Content: Is there a way to buy a gift code for the game?
I don't think so. I think the only requirement is that each copy is bought under a different email address (and hence different store account)

Just have the Gifter create an account using your email and a password to give you. They make the purchase, clear any payment info, then give you the password.

Cheers!

Capt'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
That's actually how I got the game, although that's because I don't have a credit card to pay with; I later gave my friend the $7 owed (I donated early) in cash.

I'm also wondering if you can make it so that PayPal isn't the only way to buy the game. My mom promised me KSP and she doesn't want to go through the hassle of PayPal. I'm currently hoping my uncle has an account.
PayPal can be paid with a credit card, if you so wish. You don't even need an account with PayPal as far as I recall.

Not sure on that one. You could try it.

Alternatively, you can sign up for a PayPal account and link it to your bank account directly and pay that way.
Yeah it works with a debit card, that's how I paid.
